caption:
“If you have been struggling with your hair getting greasy super fast, this is the solution for you. Using this in my routine has left my scalp so clean and has allowed me to extend my time between shower days.” Izabelle

How It Works — Hard water buildup can trap oil and weigh your hair down, making it feel greasy immediately after washing. The Act+Acre Clarifying Hard Water Treatment deeply cleanses your scalp, removing minerals and buildup so your hair stays fresher, longer.
